data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamas, Gerardo, Bollino, Maurizio (2004): Revisional notes on the " amastris " group of Catasticta Butler, 1870 (Lepidoptera: Pieridae), with descriptions of new species and subspecies. Zootaxa 605: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158584
